reviewText: Knowing all the good that Steve Jobs gave us, I am appalled by this interview!  For the most part, it was small-minded, nasty and negative. My copy is now in the garbage!!
A wonderful documentary to learn from the life of an innovator who has taught the world the tips how to put a dent in the universe to change it for better and support it to sustain
I expected interviews with Steve Jobs,not a promotion of the biography,which is splendid, the biography,I mean. However,it's serious and informative and I don't regret buying it
I look forward to seeing this DVD. I haven't had a chance to watch it yet though. Thanks again for the DVD.
